page.title: 08OCCUPATIONS
page.content: Our FathersÂ£jobs include Lecturers, Civil Servant,Solicitor,Milkman,Car Salesmen,Gardener,Roofing Contractor, Research Chemists,Architects,Economist (BBC),Doctor,Banker,Post Office & General Store Keeper,Photographer, Restaurant Owner,Driving Instructor, Communication Manager,Computer Managers Operators,Engineer & Salesmen.Most work in Henley & Harpsden & then London. Other places are Reading,Marlow,Slough, Maidenhead,High Wycombe & Sonning Common.Of 30 jobs,7 are with Computers, 5 are Salesmen & 5 have their own business.One family has a Smallholding. One Father is a part-time Fireman.There is a lot of movement with jobs.Recently four Families have come from Birmingham (2),Scotland &Derbyshire.One Family is moving to Switzerland because of the job.One Family left because the Parents separated.Most Mothers work part-time.
